title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.4 - Time of winner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.4 - Time of winner

State Regulations

The leading horse shall be timed and only such horse's
time shall be announced. No horse shall obtain a win race record by reason of
the disqualification of another horse unless a horse is declared a winner by
reason of the disqualification of a breaking horse on which such horse was
lapped. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4110.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
